Instruction: Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside. Skip this step if using using oven-ready noodles.
Soak cashews in water for at least 30 minutes.
Drain cashews and blend with nutritional yeast, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper until smooth.  Use a blender if necessary.
Saut√© chopped onion and garlic in olive oil until softened. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until browned.
Combine mushroom mixture with tofu, spinach, and Italian seasoning.
Spread a layer of marinara sauce in the bottom of a baking dish.
Layer lasagna noodles, mushroom-tofu mixture, and marinara sauce, repeating as needed.
Top with a layer of cashew cheese.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until bubbly and golden brown.
